title: Takeaways from Virginia Tech Football's 2022 schedule - VT hokiesports.com
content: Takeaways from Virginia Tech Football's 2022 schedule  VT hokiesports.com
description: Virginia Tech's 2022 schedule was made official by the ACC Monday night, Jan. 31, headlined by six home games in new head coach Brent Pry's first season back in Blacksburg.
